properties.scriptContent:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "Waiting for Function App host to be ready..."
max_attempts=30
attempt=1

while [ $attempt -le $max_attempts ]; do
    echo "Attempt $attempt of $max_attempts"
    
    # Try to get the function keys
    key=$(az functionapp keys list --name "$FUNCTION_APP_NAME" --resource-group "$RESOURCE_GROUP" --query "functionKeys.default" -o tsv 2>/dev/null || true)
    
    if [ -n "$key" ] && [ "$key" != "null" ]; then
        echo "Successfully retrieved function key"
        # Output the key in JSON format for ARM template to read
        echo "{\"functionKey\": \"$key\"}" > $AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH
        exit 0
    fi
    
    echo "Host not ready yet, waiting 30 seconds..."
    sleep 30
    attempt=$((attempt + 1))
done

echo "Failed to retrieve function key after $max_attempts attempts"
echo "{\"functionKey\": \"RETRIEVE_FROM_PORTAL\"}" > $AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH
exit 0

windowsSetupScript.value:
[concat('# Copilot Agent 365 - Windows Auto-Install Setup Script
# Save as setup.ps1 and run: .\setup.ps1

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

# Your Azure credentials from deployment
$FUNCTION_KEY = "', reference(variables('deploymentScriptName')).outputs.functionKey, '"
$FUNCTION_URL = "https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"
$OPENAI_KEY = "', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
$OPENAI_ENDPOINT = "', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
$STORAGE_ACCOUNT = "', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
$FILE_SHARE = "', variables('fileShareName'), '"

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "==========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "  Copilot Agent 365 - Setup" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "==========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""

# Check for winget
$hasWinget = Get-Command winget -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# Check for Python 3.9-3.11
Write-Host "Checking Python..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
$pythonCmd = $null
@("python3.11", "python3.10", "python3.9", "python", "py") | ForEach-Object {
    if (-not $pythonCmd) {
        try {
            $version = & $_ --version 2>&1
            if ($version -match "Python 3\.(9|10|11)") {
                $pythonCmd = $_
                Write-Host "[OK] Found $version" -ForegroundColor Green
            }
        } catch {}
    }
}

if (-not $pythonCmd) {
    Write-Host "Python 3.9-3.11 not found, installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    if ($hasWinget) {
        winget install Python.Python.3.11 --silent --accept-package-agreements --accept-source-agreements
        $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
    } else {
        Write-Host "Please install Python 3.11 from https://python.org" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
    $pythonCmd = "python"
}

# Check for Git
Write-Host "Checking Git..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (-not (Get-Command git -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "Git not found, installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    if ($hasWinget) {
        winget install Git.Git --silent --accept-package-agreements --accept-source-agreements
        $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
    } else {
        Write-Host "Please install Git from https://git-scm.com" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
}
Write-Host "[OK] Found Git" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check for Node.js
Write-Host "Checking Node.js..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (-not (Get-Command node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "Node.js not found, installing..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    if ($hasWinget) {
        winget install OpenJS.NodeJS.LTS --silent --accept-package-agreements --accept-source-agreements
        $env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","Machine") + ";" + [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable("Path","User")
    } else {
        Write-Host "Please install Node.js from https://nodejs.org" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
}
Write-Host "[OK] Found Node.js" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check for Azure Functions Core Tools
Write-Host "Checking Azure Functions Core Tools..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (-not (Get-Command func -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
    Write-Host "Installing Azure Functions Core Tools..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    npm install -g azure-functions-core-tools@4 --unsafe-perm true
}
Write-Host "[OK] Found Azure Functions Core Tools" -ForegroundColor Green

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Setting up project..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (Test-Path "function_app.py") {
    Write-Host "[OK] Project files already exist" -ForegroundColor Green
} elseif (Test-Path ".git") {
    Write-Host "Repository exists, pulling updates..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    git pull
} else {
    Write-Host "Cloning repository..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    $tempDir = New-TemporaryFile | ForEach-Object { Remove-Item $_; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $_ }
    git clone https://github.com/kody-w/EntraCopilotAgent365.git $tempDir.FullName
    Copy-Item -Path "$($tempDir.FullName)\*" -Destination "." -Recurse -Force
    Get-ChildItem -Path $tempDir.FullName -Hidden | Copy-Item -Destination "." -Recurse -Force
    Remove-Item -Path $tempDir.FullName -Recurse -Force
    Write-Host "[OK] Project files installed" -ForegroundColor Green
}

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Creating configuration..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
$localSettings = @"
{
  "IsEncrypted": false,
  "Values": {
    "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME": "python",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY": "$OPENAI_KEY",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT": "$OPENAI_ENDPOINT",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION": "2024-02-01",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME": "', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '",
    "AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME": "$STORAGE_ACCOUNT",
    "AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME": "$FILE_SHARE",
    "ASSISTANT_NAME": "', parameters('assistantName'), '",
    "CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION": "', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
  }
}
"@
$localSettings | Out-File -FilePath "local.settings.json" -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host "[OK] Configuration created" -ForegroundColor Green

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Setting up Python environment..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
if (Test-Path ".venv") { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ".venv" }
& $pythonCmd -m venv .venv
.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
pip install --upgrade pip | Out-Null
pip install -r requirements.txt
Write-Host "[OK] Python environment ready" -ForegroundColor Green

# Generate RAPPID config
$rappidId = "rapp-" + -join ((97..122) + (48..57) | Get-Random -Count 7 | ForEach-Object {[char]$_})
Write-Host "Creating RAPPID endpoint config..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
$rappidConfig = @"
{
  "id": "$rappidId",
  "name": "', parameters('assistantName'), '",
  "endpoint": "$FUNCTION_URL",
  "headers": {
    "x-functions-key": "$FUNCTION_KEY",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  }
}
"@
$rappidConfig | Out-File -FilePath "rappid-endpoint.json" -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host "[OK] RAPPID config created" -ForegroundColor Green

# Save function key to text file
"$FUNCTION_KEY" | Out-File -FilePath "function-key.txt" -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host "[OK] Function key saved to function-key.txt" -ForegroundColor Green

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "==========================================" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "  Setup Complete!" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "==========================================" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Your AI is ready! Connect using:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Option 1: Web Chat" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "  Open: https://kody-w.github.io/EntraCopilotAgent365/"
Write-Host "  Import: rappid-endpoint.json"
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Option 2: Direct API" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "  Endpoint: $FUNCTION_URL"
Write-Host "  Key file: function-key.txt"
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Option 3: Run Locally" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "  .\run.ps1"
Write-Host ""
')]

macLinuxSetupScript.value:
[concat('#!/bin/bash
# Copilot Agent 365 - Mac/Linux Setup Script
# Save as setup.sh and run: bash setup.sh

set -e

# Your Azure credentials from deployment
FUNCTION_KEY="', reference(variables('deploymentScriptName')).outputs.functionKey, '"
FUNCTION_URL="https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"
OPENAI_KEY="', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
OPENAI_ENDPOINT="', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
STORAGE_ACCOUNT="', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
FILE_SHARE="', variables('fileShareName'), '"

GREEN="\033[0;32m"
YELLOW="\033[1;33m"
CYAN="\033[0;36m"
NC="\033[0m"

echo -e "${CYAN}===========================================${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}  Copilot Agent 365 - Setup${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}===========================================${NC}"
echo

command_exists() { command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1; }

detect_os() {
    if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then echo "macos"
    elif [[ "$OSTYPE" == "linux-gnu"* ]]; then echo "linux"
    else echo "unknown"; fi
}

OS_TYPE=$(detect_os)
echo -e "${CYAN}Detected OS: $OS_TYPE${NC}"
echo

check_python_version() {
    local cmd=$1
    if command_exists $cmd; then
        local version=$($cmd --version 2>&1 | grep -oE "[0-9]+\.[0-9]+" | head -1)
        local major=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f1)
        local minor=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f2)
        if [ "$major" -eq 3 ] && [ "$minor" -ge 9 ] && [ "$minor" -le 11 ]; then
            echo $cmd; return 0
        fi
    fi
    return 1
}

install_homebrew() {
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]] && ! command_exists brew; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Homebrew...${NC}"
        /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
        [[ -f "/opt/homebrew/bin/brew" ]] && eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)"
    fi
}

install_python() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Python 3.11...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then brew install python@3.11
    elif command_exists apt-get; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3.11 python3.11-venv python3-pip
    elif command_exists yum; then sudo yum install -y python311 python311-pip; fi
}

install_git() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Git...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then brew install git
    elif command_exists apt-get; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git
    elif command_exists yum; then sudo yum install -y git; fi
}

install_nodejs() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Node.js...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then brew install node
    elif command_exists apt-get; then curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
    elif command_exists yum; then curl -fsSL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | sudo bash - && sudo yum install -y nodejs; fi
}

install_func_tools() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing Azure Functions Core Tools...${NC}"
    if [[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]]; then brew tap azure/functions && brew install azure-functions-core-tools@4
    else sudo npm install -g azure-functions-core-tools@4 --unsafe-perm true 2>/dev/null || npm install -g azure-functions-core-tools@4; fi
}

echo -e "${YELLOW}Checking prerequisites...${NC}"
[[ "$OS_TYPE" == "macos" ]] && install_homebrew

PYTHON_CMD=""
for cmd in python3.11 python3.10 python3.9 python3 python; do
    if result=$(check_python_version $cmd); then
        PYTHON_CMD=$result
        echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Found $($cmd --version)${NC}"
        break
    fi
done
[ -z "$PYTHON_CMD" ] && install_python && PYTHON_CMD=$(check_python_version python3.11 || check_python_version python3)

! command_exists git && install_git
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Found Git${NC}"

(! command_exists node || ! command_exists npm) && install_nodejs
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Found Node.js $(node --version)${NC}"

! command_exists func && install_func_tools
command_exists func && echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Found Azure Functions Core Tools${NC}"

echo
echo -e "${YELLOW}Setting up project...${NC}"
if [ -f "function_app.py" ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Project files already exist${NC}"
elif [ -d ".git" ]; then
    echo "Pulling updates..."
    git pull
else
    echo "Cloning repository..."
    TEMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d)
    git clone https://github.com/kody-w/EntraCopilotAgent365.git "$TEMP_DIR"
    cp -r "$TEMP_DIR"/* . 2>/dev/null || true
    cp -r "$TEMP_DIR"/.[^.]* . 2>/dev/null || true
    rm -rf "$TEMP_DIR"
    echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Project files installed${NC}"
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating configuration...${NC}"
cat > local.settings.json << EOF
{
  "IsEncrypted": false,
  "Values": {
    "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME": "python",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY": "$OPENAI_KEY",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT": "$OPENAI_ENDPOINT",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION": "2024-02-01",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME": "', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '",
    "AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME": "$STORAGE_ACCOUNT",
    "AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME": "$FILE_SHARE",
    "ASSISTANT_NAME": "', parameters('assistantName'), '",
    "CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION": "', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
  }
}
EOF
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Configuration created${NC}"

echo -e "${YELLOW}Setting up Python environment...${NC}"
rm -rf .venv 2>/dev/null || true
$PYTHON_CMD -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
pip install --upgrade pip > /dev/null 2>&1
pip install -r requirements.txt
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Python environment ready${NC}"

# Generate RAPPID config
RAPPID_ID="rapp-$(cat /dev/urandom | LC_ALL=C tr -dc a-z0-9 | fold -w 7 | head -n 1)"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating RAPPID endpoint config...${NC}"
cat > rappid-endpoint.json << EOF
{
  "id": "$RAPPID_ID",
  "name": "', parameters('assistantName'), '",
  "endpoint": "$FUNCTION_URL",
  "headers": {
    "x-functions-key": "$FUNCTION_KEY",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  }
}
EOF
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] RAPPID config created${NC}"

# Save function key to text file
echo "$FUNCTION_KEY" > function-key.txt
echo -e "${GREEN}[OK] Function key saved to function-key.txt${NC}"

echo
echo -e "${GREEN}===========================================${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}  Setup Complete!${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}===========================================${NC}"
echo
echo -e "${CYAN}Your AI is ready! Connect using:${NC}"
echo
echo -e "${YELLOW}Option 1: Web Chat${NC}"
echo "  Open: https://kody-w.github.io/EntraCopilotAgent365/"
echo "  Import: rappid-endpoint.json"
echo
echo -e "${YELLOW}Option 2: Direct API${NC}"
echo "  Endpoint: $FUNCTION_URL"
echo "  Key file: function-key.txt"
echo
echo -e "${YELLOW}Option 3: Run Locally${NC}"
echo "  ./run.sh"
echo
')]

setupInstructions.value:
SETUP INSTRUCTIONS:

FOR WINDOWS:
1. Copy the 'windowsSetupScript' output value
2. Save as 'setup.ps1'
3. Run: .\setup.ps1

FOR MAC/LINUX:
1. Copy the 'macLinuxSetupScript' output value
2. Save as 'setup.sh'
3. Run: bash setup.sh

Scripts automatically:
- Install Python 3.11, Git, Node.js (if needed)
- Install Azure Functions Core Tools
- Clone the repository
- Create local.settings.json with your Azure credentials
- Setup Python environment
- Save function key to function-key.txt
- Create rappid-endpoint.json for web chat

FULLY AUTOMATED - No manual configuration required!
